        Returns:
        return the number of lines updated in the table

      • delete

        public int delete(Course course)
        Delete a course from the table course. If the course is associated to a module, the deletion won't be done Auto-commit by default: each deletion is effective
        Parameters:
        course - the course to delete
        Returns:
        return the number of lines deleted from the table
